name: SLAYPRIL FOOLS DAY: THE VIDEO GAME - FULL GAME FREE
name_original: SLAYPRIL FOOLS DAY: THE VIDEO GAME - FULL GAME FREE
description:
CLICK ON GAME WINDOW TO ENSURE SOUND AND CONTROLS WORK. 

PLEASE REPORT BUGS IN COMMENTS. 

SLaYpril Fools Day : The Video Game is a retro 1988 8-bit video game originally  created for the Ante-Comp Pocket Play System. 

After visiting the props workshop to test the Video Game version of his latest movie, the actor who played Jerry Proctor was pulled into the video game world of The Prankster and the villainous alternates who want to escape into our realm. 

Uncovered from the vaults of the forgotten Ante-Comp Corporation. Slaypril Fools Day The Video Game takes the cult 80's movie franchise to a world of pixels and Pranksters.

Find out more about the MychoVerse at http://mycho.co.uk
Get EARLY PLAY TESTS and EXCLUSIVE content at http://patreon.com/mycho
